T02D2136:196a-0: @196a // ku la lo ka n'a th'a ya /
T02D2136:196a-1: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i rjes gnang gi cho ga ni /
T02D2136:196a-2: gnas dben par mandal 'dab ma brgyad byas la /
T02D2136:196a-3: de'i dbus su mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa
T02D2136:196a-4: bshams la gzhan yang ji ltar 'byor pa'i yo byad
T02D2136:196a-5: sta gon byas nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyis rnal
T02D2136:196a-7: sngags ci rigs par bzlas la /
T02D2136:196a-8: de'i rjes la bum pa cho ga bzhin du lhar bskyed la /
T02D2136:196a-9: mchod bstod bzlas pa rnams rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D2136:196a-10: de nas slob ma khrus byas nas /
T02D2136:196a-12: de nas dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa ste //
T02D2136:196a-13: zhes pa la sogs pas gsol ba btab nas /
T02D2136:196a-14: bu tshur theg pa chen po zhes pa la sogs
T02D2136:196a-15: pa'i sngags kyis theg pa la spro ba bskyed nas
T02D2136:196a-16: / dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D2136:196a-17: zhes pa la sogs pa sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D2136:196a-18: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D2136:196a-19: zhes pa la sogs pas rigs lnga'i khyad par gyi sdom pa sbyin pa dang /
T02D2136:196a-20: de rnams mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir ;
T02D2136:196a-24: rdo rje slob dpon gyi bka' mnyan pa'i sgo nas
T02D2136:196a-25: dam la gzhag / sgrub pa'i thabs ltar slob ma
T02D2136:196a-26: lhar bskyed la / aom a'a:h'um gis sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs ye shes pa gzhug pa dang /
T02D2136:196a-27: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ba rnams byas nas /
T02D2136:196a-28: gsang sngags 'bru gsum snyan nas brgyud //
T02D2136:196a-29: bka' drin gyi lan mchod pa dang //
T02D2136:196a-30: bsnyen bkur tshul bzhin du byed du gzhug / dge ba'i rtsa ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo'o //
T02D2136:196a-31: slob mas bla ma la yon phul te /
T02D2136:196a-32: ts'a ru'i bza' ba la longs spyod /
T02D2136:196a-33: lhag ma'i bar rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2136:196b-1: / gshegs su gsol ba rnams cho ga bzhin bya'o //
T02D2136:196b-2: de nas las kyi rjes mi mngon par bsdus te /
T02D2136:196b-3: bdag nyid sbyod lam kyi rnal 'byor gyis gnas par bya'o //
T02D2136:196b-4: ku la lo ka n'a th'a'i byin rlabs dang rjes
T02D2136:196b-5: gnang bya ba'i rim pa kha che'i pandi ta bi
T02D2136:196b-6: ma la shr'i'i zhal snga nas bris pa rdzogs so
T02D2136:196b-9: / // / sangs rgyas lnga yi rnam dag pa'i //
T02D2136:196b-10: ma rig bsal ba'i rim pa las //
T02D2136:196b-11: dbang bskur byed pa'i rim pa yis //
T02D2136:196b-12: ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D2136:196b-13: zhes rdo rje phreng ba las gsungs pas //
T02D2136:196b-14: ma rig pa lnga bsal nas rig pa ye shes
T02D2136:196b-15: lnga rtogs par byed pas na rig pa'i dbang ngo
